channel.title: IT Rules on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in IT Rules on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Factcheck! The IT Rules 2021 FAQ
item.description: MEITY has published Frequently Asked Questions to ‘bring clarity’ to IT Rules, 21. We separate the Facts from the Claims made in the FAQ document.

item.title: Social media giants have released their Compliance Reports for the month of August. We’ve analysed them.
item.description: Google (including YouTube), Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and Twitter have released their reports in compliance with Rule 4(1)(d) of the IT Rules 2021 for the month of August.
